content.detailedDescription: I was sitting near window and looking into the sky. some black motion was visible so i was surprise as i was sure it was not a aeroplaine or a bird, and i had already read lot of articles of ufo and i am 80% sure it was a ufo. when i first notice it was a black round object moving with great speed changing direction very quickly. i always used to read ufo articles and also had seen ancient aliens series on history channel so observing it immediately caught up my mind that this weird object is a ufo.
content.summary: Black roundish object moving with great speed

content.detailedDescription: Sitting outside staring up at the stars looking for shooting stars common to this time of year, the abnormally bright and unfamiliar star i was gazing at grew even brighter and then pulsated before disappearing into itself, like it was going to dim and get brighter once more, object did not reappear. clear night, average air traffic
content.summary: Star like object stationary bright, grew bright and dissapeared no trail llike a shooting star

content.detailedDescription:
Last summer about 0130 ish my son and i while driving on us 951 near the collier blvd hospital heading south we witness a low flying aircraft with red and white lights.  the "head" and the "tail" of the aircraft were white with a center light red at a hight level in the middle.  the front light was blinking.  it went back and forth across the 951 with very quick fluid direction changes that almost appeared to be 90 degree turns.  not a banking motion like in a small aircraft. (i used to be a student pilot)  

tonight on my way between hospitals at 0226 an aircraft flying very low was just 1-2 miles north of the 101 exit heading east.  it continued for a short distance then made several direction changes and was heading north then ended going south and then back west at about, from a distance, what appeared to be near the 101 exit.  i had stopped to try to get video on my phone but with night and the distance away i could not.  i tried to turn around to and "chase" it to try to capture video but when i got to exit 101 it was no longer visible.  during the abupt directional changes it was the exact configuration of the lights i saw last year. only different this time was that at one point it was only 2 red lights( one above the other) for about 15 seconds.  

it was nice to see it again so that i had the opportunity to verify things i thought i saw last time like the light formation but since i was more calm this time i was able to take the time to verify things like the lack of a green light on the wing of a faa registered aircraft.
content.summary: Lights changed- not faa regs   fluid but abrupt directional changes in all directions

content.detailedDescription: I was originally  looking for the moon.  i was looking out my porch when i saw this.  "what the f....?" when i saw this, it looked like something i photoed a time ago.   it turned colors and then shot up. then the rain came down.
content.summary: Triangle type.  blinking, with different lights

content.detailedDescription:
I saw what looked like straw or chaff falling from the sky while i was on the backyard patio.  some fell in the yard.  it is harvest season up and down the willamette valley.  i was looking for more falling 'straw' with my camera, when i saw something else that wasn't falling straw like material.  the object was bright white and looked as if a sheet of white paper was flipping way high in the sky.  my camera was handy: nikon d3000 dslr with a 55-200mm zoom lens.  i got about 17 shots at full 200mm zoom, good ones.  i was also watching vultures that seemed to appear in places i had been watching where there was nothing before.
[link moved to fi section/cms/tg]
content.summary: White reflective object seemed to flip while looked like the object was falling then dissappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Ufo hovered about 1 mile off coast with large rectangle light on front of it. could not see shape till it got closer. wedge shaped passed over our heads with 2 small blue lights on under neath of wing tips. object was about 500 feet over our head.Our elevation was 160 ft above the ground because each floor is 30 ft high. the the ufo seemed about another 300. ft higher.  it passed over very slowly, no more than 40-50 mph. the building blocked the view after it passed by.  we work at revel casino in atlantic city nj. we were checking the outdoor pools and spas on the 5 the floor outside level. at first we thought it was a coast guard helicopter doing night  rescue missions . it was very exciting to see it. this was my 2 nd time seeing a ufo. my first was the summer of 1967 which i also made a report on. i did report this sighting in july but never got a return call.
content.summary: Ufo hovered about 1 mile off coast, then came inland over the casino where i work. it disappeared because building blocked view.

content.detailedDescription:
My significant other and i had just walked out onto our driveway. we typically have a great view of the night sky, so  as usual we turned our eyes towards the sky. immediately we noticed what looked to be a "star" moving across the sky. this thing was going so fast that it crossed the entire sky and passed in front of orion's belt before fading away- all in less than a minute. as soon as the first object faded from view, another appeared coming from the opposite direction. it appeared to be the same distance away, except before it crossed the sky, it had to ascend into the sky. it rose from below our line of sight and was all the way across the sky in seconds. 

that object didn't fade away while in view, as the other object did, but instead kept moving straight across the sky until it was out of view completely. as soon as that object disappeared, we noticed a plane in the sky moving from east to west. the plane was blinking and we typically see planes every night following that same trajectory, so no surprise there. both objects that we saw were moving in a straight line, albeit one only did after ascending into the sky.  we first thought the objects were shooting stars, but both were visible for far too long and moved too far across the sky in such a short time. 

i was nervous while we were watching this happen. i'm not sure why, but it was just eerie.  we've had closer sightings before that shook us up, so maybe that explains the nerves. as soon as it was over my significant other told me is better get to mufon.
content.summary: Saw two separate lights that appeared to be stars, apparently at the distance of stars, moving fast across the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was scanning the sky south from my upstairs patio, which faces south.  there were scattered clouds but they did not block my line of sight.  i was out there because a couple of days ago i saw a group or stars that appeared like they were in a circle (see youtube [link moved to fi section/cms/tg]).  i had the camera on and all of a sudden i got a warning on the lcd i had never seen before: "this battery is incompatible with your camera."  i thought i would go in and change the battery, but then i remembered how another sighting turned off my cell phone, so i went back out and using low-light mode scanned the southern sky at about 75 degree again.  i had zoom in to about 2-30x when i saw a blue, pulsating light, stationary.  it was changing colors in all spectrums, and even though i was using fixed focus i could not get a good edge detail, there was some kind of aura around it.  my cell phone got turned off 3 more times, so i got another battery.  this time i was able to film it for about 20 minutes.  i zoomed out to let viewer see that it was very far away, not visible to the naked eye, only when i zoomed way in.  it was not a star, in my opinion, as it constantly changed colors in an amazing way.  since it was so far away it could not have been an artificial source, such as a hovering toy, etc.  i think it was at least 100 miles out and was probably very large.  it is posted on youtube at ([link moved to fi section/cms/tg])attachement converted to mp4 using adobe video encoder.  i have original avchd file
content.summary: Circular pulsating color-changing plasma-like orb

content.detailedDescription: At around 9:15 pm i went outside to my backyard patio to smoke a cigarette. i do not smoke in the house (wife). i was watching commercial aircraft going to midway in chicago. i am in an area that is part of the final approach path to mdw. these planes always fly at around 1500 ft and from a sw to ne flight path as they approach mdw. i turned around to call my dog to come to me so we could go back into the house and i saw a huge flame orange light fly above my neighbors house at about the same altitude as the commercial aircraft fly. the light was as large or slightly larger than any plane i have observed from this viewpoint. it was flying slightly faster than the commercial aircraft and was on a nw to se flight path which is on a collision course with the approaching aircraft. it seemed to fly in front of a commercial plane and then went on until it disappeared. now somewhat in disbelief as to what i had just seen, i noticed another ufo on the same flight path as the last one. i opened the back door and called my daughter down to see what was happening. i should note the time between these two sightings was about 3 to 4 minutes. both my daughter and i watched the second ufo fly along the exact same flight path almost intersecting another commercial aircraft. we thought there could be a mid air collision, but thankfully that didn't happen although it looked very close. my daughter was surprised as was i. then about 3 to 4 minutes later another ufo was observed along the exact same flight path. same color light, same triangular shape. my daughter and i saw a total of 5 of these crafts together all about 3 to 4 minutes apart. my wife then returned home and came outside to join us. she witnessed two ufo's with me and my daughter. there were a total of 6 ufo's that i witnessed. my daughter witnessed 5 of the 6 with me and my wife witnessed 2 of the 6 with both me and my daughter. these ufo's seemed to fly with complete impunity and did not seem to have any regard for the commercial aircraft in the area. i would also think one or more flight crews witnessed a ufo from the air. i would think at least one or more pilots thought there were going to be involved in a mid air collision. they had to see these objects. if they saw the objects, they should have inquired to the mdw control tower for confirmation of an air space intrusion. they were large and bright. i would also think there should be many more witness' to this event. it was a clear night, minimal clouds and no wind. these crafts were silent and flew on the exact same path. i kept looking in the sky for about another 45 minutes but saw nothing else unusual.I did not sleep well that night as my mind was too active and excited by these sightings. i have no idea what they were, but i do not think they were in contact or communication with the commercial aviation tower because they seemed to be crossing directly in front of the airplanes. although it was dark, these objects appeared to fly very close to the commercial aircraft. i have looked every night since the first sightings, but i think it may have been a one time event.
content.summary: My daughter and myself witnessed 5 ufo's flying silently above our home

content.detailedDescription: I was outside my home when i happened to see a line of 4-5 white/ pale orange lights in the cloud cover in the south, somewhere between 9 and 10:30 pm. i assumed they must have been part of a craft, but i could not see it. it appeared to be about the length of a football field. the lights stayed the same shape, moved a short distance slowly and disappeared. after it disappeared i heard jets. i was telling my brother in law about it and he said that he had seen lights fitting the description at 9:30pm northeast of circleville, he also said he saw a physical craft and it was moving.
content.summary: Saw a straight line of lights at a 45 degree angle, in the clouds

content.detailedDescription: Went outside to sit in cool nite air. i noticed the object because i could see it was hovering and swaying in an ark while going in a random circular or zigzag path. i thought right away this is a ufo. even before i got binoculars. i lived near a military base for 3 yrs. and in my whole life never saw anything move like this. once i observed it with binoculars. i was sure it was  a ufo. the binoculars are 7 x 35wide angle. by vivtar. the object hovered in the same location the whole time. it moved side to side in swaying arc and zigzaged and circle patterns. but in a series of rapid tight moves. it shot out at least six glowing white orbs that traveled down past the horizon. two of these there was a light that flashed from the ground after they went behind the tree line. and several of the orbs flew horizontal from the craft occasionaly fladhing single flashes at a time. and afterwards i was aexcited.While the craft was movibg in flight it was changing its attitude. you could see it horizontal verticle from the side. its lights flashed first 3 the all the colors i mentioned rose white orange yellow and blue. and the lights seemed to be flashing in a circular pattern. sometimes completing the circle and then others it would do certain sections in repitition varring back and forth. and the lights were in color clustered sections. with a larger light in center with 3spoke s of lights from center to ring of lights. pulsing the whole time. the last couple hrs. it was all white light and while they still had the outer ring of lights the inside changed patterns and size. pulsi g the whole time. it alsoseemed to be emitting a plasma or vapor trail that kind of whiped out from the object as it moved. i lost sight of it pre dawn. when some light cloud cover obscured it. it didnt make any sound i could hear. i did not feel threatened. i was excited. and amazed. however the cows on the farm across from us were making alot of moise. several times i shined a flashlight up at the orbs and a flash followed shortly. in response? i dont know. but it was within seconds of my flash it responded. and i was glad we had a family friend. staying the nite who observed it with me for about the first 90 minutes. afterwards i was thrilled to have wittnessed it. and will be watching for a chance to see it again. the friend who saw it with me was in the navy and never saw anything like it either.
content.summary: Observed object hovering in sky with naked eye. got binoculars and observed for 4 1/2 hr. it pulsed flashing ejected objects.

content.detailedDescription: Me and a friend was in my garden smoking a cigarette when we noticed a airoplane flying over and we're intreged about its bright headlights. we watch as it flew over and i notice something which i thought was a star but it got brighter by the planes headlights and seemed to move up suddenly out of the path of the plane. that's when i pointed it out to my friiend. when the planed passed it moved very quickly, maybe as fast as the plane in a different direction,  but not going in a straight line. it then seemed to disappear into the darkness getting further away.  we were both quite confused about this because of the way it moved and how quick it was. so i thought i'd report it and see if any pilots happened to report anything from the same sort of time, date and area.
content.summary: Starlike thing in the air. looked like headlights from a plane lit it up more and it moved out of the path of the plane. a flew off changing directions.

content.detailedDescription: I was sleeping in my room when my dog started growling and barking! my window was open and i heard what sounded like a person outside my house walking in the gravel. i very quietly got out of bed and snuck into a area in my house to where i noticed something pass in front of a outside light casting a child size shadow. i then tried to sneak to the window and peer out and i couldn't see anything! i then went into the garage open the garage door thinking that there was someone outside my house trying to steal or do something that they shouldn't be doing around 330am. as i was standing in the door way after the garage door opened something peaked out from behind a tree looking at me. i was then frozen with absolute fear and panic! i am writing you to try to find out if i am having multiple encounters, because i always feel watched at night and am terrified to be at home after dark.I have vivid nightmares about abduction and often awaken from a dream because i feel i am falling i try not to sleep at night and only sleep during the day! i want answers because i am a 28yo male that is 6'5 and i am terrified of whatever i saw and is going on! i have only told 2 people about whats been going on with me and a total of 4 about what i saw that night. i don't want to be labeled crazy and i really don't want any kind of exposer, i just want help!
content.summary: Child like figure walked through light in front yard went out to invistgate and figure poped its head out from behind a tree to look at me followed by ufo's

content.detailedDescription: Three of us witnessed several glowing red/orange orbs in a line over perhaps 5 miles. they took their own paths eventually and at times became completely stationary. they seemed to react to us. they then faded away completely. there was never any sound at all. the glow was like lava or fire but in a perfect circle. this area is at the foot of the pocono mountains and the 476 mountain tunnel near the mahoning valley turnpike exit. there have been sightings here for years. some have reported metal spheres seen in daylight breaking through cloud cover through to sunlight. many have speculated that there is an underground base at the location of the tunnel as there was a excessive amount of material removed during construction of the tunnel that can still be seen today. there is also heat coming out of sinkholes on the mountain itself.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Several orange/red glowing orbs...Glow looked larger than airplane lights, organic like lava.

content.detailedDescription: About 16 yrs ago me and my husband were out walking as we couldn't sleep it was around 6-30am when we went out. so we went for a walk out the back roads of downpatrick co.Down, n.Ireland . we saw a white round shape in the sky about a 1000 ft up or so as we walked it seemed to follow us it was like holding a basketball or soccer ball on your outstretched hand. that may gave you a helping hand on working out the size of it. as we walked into the town it disappeared but when we got near the  house it reappeared. it must have been a good hour that we seen it first then about five minutes when we got home as we went into the house and forgot about it as we knew no one would believe us if we hada told anyone at the time. i don't drink nor drugs nor does my husband so it wasn't though it. we still think about it and we decided to let you know when we seen a programme about ufos on it and you where talking about them the programme is called hanger 1.  we don't know if anyone else seen it there was cars on the road at the time there won't any planes or any other kind of aircraft about the moon was only a quarter moon and it was on the other side of where we were there was no stars out as it was a clear morning. the dat i gave is around that date we know it was in april and about 16 years ago.
content.summary: Round white ball like object it you hold a basketball on an outstretched arm about a 1000 ft up

content.detailedDescription: I went out to smoke a cigar, looking at venus and a light 5 times brighter than venus, 1 inch at arms length, shown.  the light came on for 0.5 seconds and went out.  i continued to watch for 15-20 minutes and nothing else observed.  there was no aircraft or sound near the light.  a very faint light existed at the site for about 5 seconds after the 0.5 light emission.  it was not an aircraft because i live near kci airport and the aircraft are very obvious.  there was no way this light could have been an aircraft or sat.  i was thinking at the exact time, 'why don't the ufos ever show themselves".  it was weird.  i have lived near kci for 30 years and have observed many aircraft.  aircraft blink about every 1-2 seconds and have running lights.  it could have been a meteorite coming straight at my line of sight, however, that is statistically very unlikely and what would explain the stationary 5 second faint glow. it was quite weird.
content.summary: A bright light for 0.5 seconds and nothing more, no plane, chopper, etc.

content.detailedDescription: Star like object, bright no flashing lights. observed by 10 people for around 90 seconds. my family was out side and my wife called me out to look at it.Moved with mechanical precession in straight path west to east. turned pink and diappeared. have never seen anything like this before. was amazed at the precession on its trajectory. we star gaze all the time we watch satellites all the time as they brighten along there trajectory. this was different it was low. felt stunned by what we saw waited for it to come back, but it didn't.
content.summary: Bright star like,low in sky,straight line,mechanical precession like.

content.detailedDescription: Border wars river under seige season 3 episode 10  exactly 33 minutes into episode a white oval shaped object is seen hovering next to a cloud at approximately 20,000 ft. i believe object will look good under imaging enhancers. not a helicopter, blimp, drone, commercial airliner, etc, i served on an aircraft carrier and know wth i'm talking about. those are my credentials and you're welcome.
content.summary: Tv

content.detailedDescription:
July 22 2014   1 - 13:30 am

    my husband and i were driving east along the yellow head highway number 16 in saskatchewan.
    sometime after midnight we pulled off the highway and drove south into the town of maidstone to get some rest. we were facing south at the corner of railway ave. and third st. w when we saw the object above a field south west of the intersection not that far from us.
    i saw what looked like a shooting star, a white streak across the sky. it suddenly stopped and just hung in the air.
    it was a long oval that seamed to divide into two parts, rainbow coloured with an ammolite type shimmer and a bright white light at one end.
    the object hung in the air for some time, long enough for my husband and i to ask each other if we saw what we were seeing.
    it suddenly divided and disappeared.
    there was no sound from this object at any time it was silent. i have no idea what it was at all.

my husbands account of the same sighting.

    i was at the intersection facing south when the object came into view. it was about 300 meters away and it filled up half the windshield.
    the object looked like it was made of a cluster of tubes, green with 2 or 3 red lights at the end.
    at one end there was a bright white and yellow glow almost like a mist. the colours on it we the brightest and most vivid i have ever seen.
    i don't know how long it stayed still, 30 or 40 seconds.
    it was silent the whole time, i had my window down and there was no noise.
    in a split second it shot away from us and was gone.
    it looked like it was operated by and intelligent presence.
    
it was not a helicopter or plane nor was it fireworks or a para flair. both of us spent more than 10 years in the canadian military and we are familiar with these things. this was nothing like we have ever seen before. during and after the sighting we were interested, calm and not frightened.
content.summary: Long oval or tube like, multi coloured and brightly lit. silent and hovering.

content.detailedDescription:
It was 23:33 on sunday august 17. i was preparing to leave work for the night near cal state fullerton in orange county california. i was loading my equipment in to the car and out of the corner of my eye what appeared to be two aircraft flying through each other's path to the west. when i looked i realized one was an airplane flying at altitude and the other was flying much lower eastbound at about the altitude of a patrol helicopter. it had a very bright solid red light and a dull pulsing green light offset above and to the right but very close together. i assumed it was a police helicopter (which generally have a dull solid green light and pulsing red light) until it suddenly came to a complete stop without decelerating at what appeared to be a distance of approximately two blocks away at roughly an altitude of 100ft. the object remained hovering for roughly 30 seconds and then lowered rapidly, again without any visible acceleration (it was instantly at full speed) until it was barely visible over the two story building across the street. again it remained there for a period of time (30sec - 2min) then raised up to its original altitude (note that each time this light moves in this description it does so with no apparent acceleration/deceleration) it hovers again for roughly 30 seconds and then moves north 200/300 feet. it then repeats the pattern of lowering then rising, hovering in between for close to a minute. it then moves west approx 50/100ft. then it moves south again aprox 200/300 ft. until it is due west from my position. it lowered again until i could just barely see it over the rooftop across the street (two story building) where it remained for a minute and lowered again out of sight. i never regained sight of object.

my initial thought was helicopter, due to the similarities of light arrangement, though the lights on a helicopter are further apart and local patrol helicopters also have white strobes, this did not. also, while feasible that a helicopter could possible move in such a way, i noticed that there was no wobble or rotation to the lights. they remained perfectly oriented as the object moved, where a helicopter will pitch and yaw. also, at the distance the object appeared to be, and as familiar with the area anf local air traffic as i am (the area is centered between airports within 10/20 miles east and west) i should have been able to hear it if it was a helicopter. i also suspected it could have been a radio controlled drone, but the lights were large (and the red exceptionally bright) and i am familiar with drones and how loud their four motors can be. at that distance again i should have been able to hear a drone, especially at that size. and again the lights were perfectly oriented. so i am at a loss to identify the object. i chose to report it in hopes that someone else might have witnessed it.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Bright red light/pulsing green light in sky rapidly moving, changing direction and hovering

content.detailedDescription: I was returning to work when i spotted so strange, slow moving object in the sky. i pulled out my camera and shot video. there was movement on the object, but no light or exhaust. silent.
content.summary: Daylight sighting of slow moving object

content.detailedDescription:
i observed this object at many times while living there , i've also seen it in other places of the province...
i have since moved to alberta, and have not encountered the object or likeness here yet..
content.summary: This object appears every clear night in the same place ,same direction ,it almost seems to be tethered  like a lite and it's movements..The blinking lights are what i noticed at first..They change colours at will .The object moves through out the night .

content.detailedDescription: There is round shape of ufo and still in air after around 2 min it was lost in the sky
content.summary: There is round shape of ufo and still in air

content.detailedDescription: My daughter and i were driving east on mahogany dr. toward cr 305 at approximately 8:45p on 8/20/14.  at the stop sign, looking straight ahead (east,)we saw 2 or 3 very bright lights hovering above the fields.  we both thought initially that it was an small airplane, not uncommon in the area.  as we watched it for a very short distance (heading north on cr 305) my daughter said that it is not an airplane. (we then turned east on  cr 302) then we thought a cell tower.  neither of us remembered a tower in this area, and the lights were bright white not red and not flashing.  she tried several times to get a photo on her phone but trees and driving obstructed her view.  she kept trying not sure what she was getting.  we traveled a couple of miles and turned south onto cr 65 to see if we could get a picture.  we drove to a clear area and looked west but the lights were no longer there.  we did see an airplane at this time.  when we were returning home approximately 1 hour later we searched the horizon over the field and did not see anything but a few red tower lights very low on the horizon. she checked her pictures at home and we were surprised by what she was actually able to get.
content.summary: Stationary lights

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend saw a bright light change shapes and colors for two and a half hours as it trailed 15 degrees se and 0 degrees s
content.summary: Saw bright light trail across horizon and change shapes/colors

content.detailedDescription: Walking out to shed to close door for the night happen to be looking at sky as i always do when instantly two lights bigger than stars appeared moving quite quickly mimicking each other exactly flying in the pattern of a wave or ocean swell for about 3 seconds and then disappeared into cloud and blinked off stood their for 4 minutes and then thought i saw a quick flash
content.summary: 2 lights in formation

content.detailedDescription:
I was on a small cruise ship touring in the ketchikan area (the tongass narrows) with a group of co-workers and friends.  at about 8:00 pm, i was taking some photos of the sunset with my iphone.  i took three shots of the sunset.  the following evening, as i downloaded the photos to my computer, i noticed the bright light in the sky (upper left corner of all three photos at slightly different angles since the boat we were traveling was heading north or north-west as i was taking the sunset photos. i did not notice the bright light in the sky as i was taking the photos, yet the light object is clearly in the photo.  since i did not see the object directly at time of the photo, i cannot say that it was actually moving in the sky. on the photo the object or light appears oval of possibly disk shaped.   

i have attached 3 original digital photos and one that i enlarged and enhanced.
content.summary: Object appeared in sunset digital photos that was not observed while taking the photos with my iphone.

content.detailedDescription:
I can say beyond a shadow of doubt that the sighting of lights definitely were not a reflection and to offer that as a plausible explanation is pure nonsense. i live approximately 70 miles nw of houston. although houston had rain, we had no rain that evening, monday 8/11/14. 

i was not in a car and clearly saw the unidentifiable lights.  from my vantage point i saw a ring of colored lights, some brighter than others, that appeared to be a round to oblong shaped ring of lights. the ring of lights seemed as if the ring was standing on edge and appeared to change shape as if the ring would partially rotate on a perpendicular axis in one direction to another and at one point seemed to tilt. the lights then just vanished and were no longer visible without apparent streaking away. i thought at first a helicopter or plane but realized that clearly was not the case.

i was driving down the read on my ranch cart heading in the direction of the object.
the bright colored abnormal lights is what caught my attention just above a distant treelike.
not a typical rotary nor fixed wing aircraft.
feelings, wonderment, wanted visually confirm what i was seeing.
the road is hilly as the geography. the objects became obscured by the treelike as the road changed.
content.summary: Ring of bright multi-colored lights of varying intensities appearing to pulsate

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside closing up at my work doing day to day closing tasks when i looked up to the sky and noticed the objects. i first thought they were just planes, then i thought they were shooting stars, and then i eliminated those possibilities. this is because the objects were larger than stars, orange in color, moving very slowly across the sky. the objects seemed to be a large distance away from each other, but they were identical and moving parallel with one another. they were flying in a northwest direction around 9 pm over central new hampshire.
i was pumped and intrigued when i saw the objects because i like the thought of the unknown. i stood in disbelief for a bit. perhaps it the objects were just some unidentifiable military craft, but it is cool to keep an open mind. i thought the way the objects looked and were flying parallel without making a sound was rather bizarre. i lost sight of one of the objects due to the tree line, and the other disappeared slowly in the distance. it was strange because i thought i'd be able to see it for a lot longer, because it was a clear night and i can usually see airplanes along the horizon during the night. 
ultimately, this event was strange and different. i hope that other people saw what i saw so i can get a better idea of what these objects were.
content.summary: Large star like objects far away from each other moving parallel with each other

content.detailedDescription: Sitting in my room checking my phone. then noticed lights that seemed to airplane flashing lights their beacon lights. then it changed flight path dipped a bit lower then bavk up. it did the same thing but thr light flashing pattern was random not rhythm to thrm. i wasn't sure if i was seeing it correctly i asked my sister to check it out dhe saw the same thing it's irregular flight psth. she felt a bit uneasy as did i. i could no longer track it after it was out of view of my window. then minutes later an airplane flew a normal flight its lights flashing was normal
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: No solid flight path so it couldn't be a plane. it moved too much
